Symptoms: Dry lips, cracking, pain, redness, swelling, burning sensation
Precautions: Avoid spicy and salty foods. Stay hydrated. Use lip balm with SPF.
Possible Causes: Vitamin B deficiency, weather exposure, allergies, dehydration
Home Tips: Apply coconut oil or ghee. Use honey on lips. Drink warm milk with turmeric.

Symptoms: White patches in mouth, irritation, difficulty chewing, burning sensation, soreness
Precautions: Avoid tobacco and alcohol. Regular dental check-ups recommended.
Possible Causes: Tobacco use, alcohol consumption, chronic irritation, HPV infection
Home Tips: Gargle with turmeric water. Eat vitamin A rich foods. Avoid betel nut.

Symptoms: Painful ulcers, burning sensation, red border, difficulty eating, white patches, recurrent sores
Precautions: Avoid acidic, spicy foods. Maintain good oral hygiene. Reduce stress.
Possible Causes: Stress, nutritional deficiency (B12, iron, folate), immune issues, hormonal changes
Home Tips: Apply honey directly on ulcers. Rinse with coconut water. Eat yogurt daily.

Symptoms: Mouth sores, redness, bleeding gums, pain, swelling, burning sensation
Dosage/Usage: Calendula MT gargle + Merc sol 30C, 4 times daily
Precautions: Avoid hot, spicy foods. Use soft toothbrush. Rinse with saltwater.
Possible Causes: Chemotherapy, radiation therapy, infection, autoimmune disorders
Home Tips: Gargle with turmeric saltwater. Eat cooling foods. Apply aloe vera gel.

Symptoms: Red patches, burning sensation, sensitivity to spicy food, irritation, change in taste
Dosage/Usage: Taraxacum Q, 10 drops in water 2× daily
Precautions: Avoid very spicy, acidic foods. Maintain oral hygiene.
Possible Causes: Nutritional deficiencies, stress, allergies, immune system issues
Home Tips: Rinse with baking soda water. Eat probiotic foods. Avoid trigger foods.

Symptoms: Enlarged tongue, speech issues, airway obstruction, difficulty swallowing, drooling
Precautions: Consult doctor if breathing difficulty occurs. Monitor speech development.
Possible Causes: Congenital, Down syndrome, hypothyroidism, tumors
Home Tips: Speech therapy may help. Eat soft foods. Practice tongue exercises.

Symptoms: Swollen salivary gland, pain, fever, pus discharge, difficulty opening mouth
Dosage/Usage: Belladonna 30C every 2 hours until fever subsides
Precautions: Apply warm compress. Drink plenty of fluids. Avoid sour foods.
Possible Causes: Bacterial infection (usually Staph/Strep), poor oral hygiene, dehydration
Home Tips: Apply warm compress 3-4× daily. Drink herbal teas. Massage gently.

Symptoms: Salivary gland stone, swelling, pain while eating, reduced saliva, recurrent infections
Precautions: Massage gland area gently. Stay hydrated. Avoid dehydration.
Possible Causes: Dehydration, reduced saliva flow, calcium buildup, gland inflammation
Home Tips: Drink 8-10 glasses water daily. Suck on lemon drops. Apply warm compress.

Symptoms: Irritability, drooling, swollen gums, loss of appetite, sleeplessness, biting tendency
Precautions: Provide teething toys. Keep baby comfortable. Monitor temperature.
Possible Causes: Normal infant development, tooth eruption through gums
Home Tips: Give chilled teething ring. Massage gums gently. Offer cold fruit puree.

Symptoms: Toothache, cavities, sensitivity, bad breath, pain on chewing, black spots on teeth
Precautions: Reduce sugar intake. Brush twice daily. Regular dental check-ups.
Possible Causes: Poor oral hygiene, excessive sugar intake, bacteria, dry mouth
Home Tips: Rinse with saltwater after meals. Avoid sugary foods. Chew sugar-free gum.

Symptoms: Severe tooth pain, sensitivity to hot/cold, throbbing pain, swelling, night aggravation
Dosage/Usage: Belladonna 30C every hour during acute pain
Precautions: Avoid very hot/cold foods. See dentist promptly. Avoid chewing on affected side.
Possible Causes: Deep cavity reaching pulp, trauma, repeated dental procedures, crack in tooth
Home Tips: Rinse with warm saltwater. Apply clove oil. Avoid temperature extremes.

Symptoms: Severe toothache, pus discharge, facial swelling, throbbing pain, fever, bad breath
Precautions: See dentist immediately. Avoid pressure on tooth. Take pain relief if needed.
Possible Causes: Untreated cavity, trauma, previous dental work, infection spread
Home Tips: Rinse with saltwater frequently. Apply ice pack externally. Keep head elevated.

Symptoms: Swollen gums, bleeding, tooth loosening, pain on chewing, pus pockets, bad breath
Precautions: Use soft toothbrush. Avoid smoking. Regular dental cleaning needed.
Possible Causes: Poor oral hygiene, plaque buildup, smoking, genetics, diabetes
Home Tips: Oil pulling with coconut oil. Massage gums with salt. Eat vitamin C foods.

Symptoms: Red gums, bleeding, tenderness, swelling, bad breath, painful chewing
Precautions: Brush gently. Floss daily. Avoid tobacco. Regular dental visits.
Possible Causes: Plaque buildup, poor brushing/flossing, smoking, pregnancy hormones
Home Tips: Massage gums with salt water. Rinse with warm saltwater 3× daily.

Symptoms: Heartburn, regurgitation, chest pain, dry cough, sour taste, difficulty swallowing
Precautions: Avoid lying down after eating. Elevate head while sleeping. Limit caffeine, alcohol.
Possible Causes: Weakened lower esophageal sphincter, hiatal hernia, pregnancy, obesity
Home Tips: Chew gum to increase saliva. Sleep with head elevated. Drink chamomile tea.

Symptoms: Stomach pain, nausea, indigestion, vomiting, bloating, acidity
Homeopathy Medicines: Nux vomica, Carbo veg, Arsenicum album
Dosage/Usage: Nux vomica 30C, 3 pellets 3× daily before meals
Precautions: Eat small frequent meals. Avoid alcohol, NSAIDs. Reduce stress.
Possible Causes: H. pylori infection, NSAID overuse, excessive alcohol, stress, autoimmune
Home Tips: Eat bananas to neutralize acid. Drink cold milk. Avoid late night eating.

Symptoms: Abdominal pain, bloating, nausea, vomiting, indigestion, burning pain after meals
Precautions: Avoid spicy, acidic foods. Eat slowly. Stay upright after meals.
Possible Causes: H. pylori, NSAIDs, alcohol, bile reflux, stress
Home Tips: Drink coconut water. Eat small frequent meals. Take probiotics.

Symptoms: Pain swallowing, chest pain, nausea, vomiting blood, weight loss, heartburn
Precautions: Avoid tobacco, alcohol. Eat soft foods. Lose weight if overweight.
Possible Causes: GERD, infections, medications, caustic ingestion, radiation
Home Tips: Eat soft bland foods. Drink aloe vera juice. Avoid citrus fruits.

Symptoms: Painful swallowing, chest discomfort, burning sensation, cough, nausea, regurgitation
Dosage/Usage: Nux vomica 30C, 3 pellets 3× daily after meals
Precautions: Avoid trigger foods. Eat small meals. Don't lie down after eating.
Possible Causes: Acid reflux, infections, medications, allergies, radiation therapy
Home Tips: Drink cold milk before meals. Eat oatmeal. Avoid trigger foods.

Symptoms: Severe toothache, swelling, pus discharge, bad breath, throbbing pain, fever
Precautions: Apply cold compress. Avoid hot foods. See dentist urgently.
Possible Causes: Untreated cavity, trauma, gum disease, bacterial infection
Home Tips: Rinse mouth with saltwater hourly. Apply cold compress. Avoid hot foods.

Symptoms: High temperature, chills, headache, body ache, weakness, sweating, fatigue
Dosage/Usage: Belladonna 30C every 2 hours for sudden high fever, Aconitum 30C for fever with anxiety
Precautions: Rest completely. Drink plenty of fluids. Monitor temperature regularly.
Possible Causes: Viral infection, bacterial infection, inflammation, immune response
Home Tips: Take paracetamol 500mg every 6 hours. Use cold compress. Maintain hydration with ORS.

Symptoms: Fever, headache, body ache, fatigue, chills, weakness, runny nose, sore throat
Dosage/Usage: Gelsemium 30C for weakness with fever, Eupatorium perf 30C for bone pain
Precautions: Complete bed rest. Avoid exposure to cold. Drink warm fluids only.
Possible Causes: Viral infections (influenza, dengue, chikungunya), seasonal changes
Home Tips: Take prescribed antivirals if needed. Use paracetamol for symptomatic relief. Maintain electrolyte balance.

Symptoms: High fever, headache, abdominal pain, weakness, rose spots, constipation
Dosage/Usage: Baptisia 30C for typhoid symptoms, Arsenicum album 30C for weakness
Precautions: Strict isolation. Boiled water only. Complete antibiotic course as prescribed.
Possible Causes: Salmonella typhi bacteria, contaminated food/water, poor sanitation
Home Tips: Take prescribed antibiotics (Azithromycin 500mg daily). Maintain strict hygiene. Eat easily digestible food.

Symptoms: Periodic fever with chills, headache, vomiting, sweating, rigors
Homeopathy Medicines: China officinalis, Natrum mur, Arsenicum album
Dosage/Usage: China 30C for periodic fever, Natrum mur 30C for headache with fever
Precautions: Immediate medical attention. Complete antimalarial course. Use mosquito protection.
Possible Causes: Plasmodium parasite via Anopheles mosquito bites, tropical regions
Home Tips: Take prescribed antimalarials (Artemether-Lumefantrine). Use mosquito nets. Maintain hydration.

Symptoms: High fever, severe headache, eye pain, muscle pain, skin rash, low platelet count
Dosage/Usage: Eupatorium perf 30C for bone-breaking pain, Crotalus horridus 30C for bleeding tendency
Precautions: Monitor platelet count daily. Avoid aspirin. Seek immediate medical care if bleeding.
Possible Causes: Dengue virus transmitted by Aedes mosquito, tropical/subtropical regions
Home Tips: Take only paracetamol for fever. Maintain fluid intake. Monitor for warning signs of bleeding.
